message:
Graphics Designer
 
 
 ESSENTIAL JOB FUNCTIONS
 
 • Graphical Designing website, solutions, logos, presentations ,icons , visual screens ,…..
 • Transforming his website and screen designs to HTML and CSS
 • Owns success – Takes responsibility for successful delivery of the solutions

 REQUIRED SKILLS

 •  Qualification in Graphic Arts, Web Design, or related field
 •  Minimum of 2- 4  years' work experience  as a Graphic/Web Designer. 
 •  Advanced knowledge of digital imaging and illustration through Adobe Photoshop, Illustrator, flash and Adobe Dreamweaver. 
 • Skills in branding is required ( Logos , Cards , …. )
 • Interactive designs, with a web and mobile usability interface.
 • Knowledge of dynamic HTML, XML and JavaScript. 
 • Good knowledge of current web-design trends and techniques.
 • Good knowledge in Adobe Flash & JQuery & HTML5 is aplus
 • Knowledge in Joomla is a plus
 • Must submit portfolio 
If you are interested forward your CV to mohamed.elkerdany@CodeStreamz.com with title "Graphics Designer"
